context: Hi! What's your pleasure? War? Black Hawk Down (2002) is a favorite of mine
I don't really enjoy war movies. I much prefer horror. My favorites are The Shining (1980) , The Witch (2015) and Resolution (2012)
Have you seen The Shape of Water (2017)
No, but I'd like to It won the Oscar for Best Film, right?
Yeah, I saw it a long time ago I liked the book better but the movie was okay
I really liked The Hatching (2016) though I thought the book was better
I've never heard of that movie I'll check it out
I kinda thought of The Road (2009) as a horror movie
resp: Again, I preferred the book! World War Z was good too

context.content: "Criminal (2016)" is a gripping action film about a convict who receives the memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent in a desperate attempt to stop a diabolical plot. It's filled with intense action sequences and a suspenseful storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
That sounds intense! But I'm also looking for some humor and entertainment in the movie. Does "Criminal (2016)" have those elements too?

I'm not sure if it has the humorous and entertaining elements I'm looking for. The recommender seems knowledgeable about the movie, but I'll need to find out more before making a decision.
